com.hedera.hashgraph.identity

Interface HederaDid

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HcsDid

    public interface HederaDid
    Hedera Decentralized Identifier.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HederaDid fromString(java.lang.String didString)
      Parses the given DID string into a HederaDid object.
      DidDocumentBase generateDidDocument()
      Generates a basic DID document for this identity.
      DidSyntax.Method getMethod()
      Returns a DID method of this DID.
      HederaNetwork getNetwork()
      Returns a Hedera HederaNetwork for which the DID is created.
      java.lang.String toDid()
      Converts the HederaDid object into a DID string.
